Zero-Waste Kitchen Tips

Smart ways to reduce food waste and maximize nutrition

‚ôªÔ∏è

Freeze Leftover Dal

Freeze leftover dal for soups. It stays fresh for up to 3 months and makes a quick, protein-rich meal.

üçõ

Reuse Rice

Reuse rice for kheer or pulao. Day-old rice works perfectly for these traditional dishes.

ü•ï

Save Veggie Scraps

Save veggie scraps for stock. Create flavorful vegetable broth while reducing waste.

üåø

Compost Organic Waste

Compost organic waste for plants. Create nutrient-rich soil while reducing kitchen waste.
